name: amurex
description: Amurex is the backend system behind memory-based AI assistants. It provides neural memory and intelligent recall features using a flexible API and vector database, aimed at building personalized knowledge-driven AI apps.
features: Neural Memory: AI assistants with long-term memory capabilities. Context that persists.
Intelligent Recall: Retrieve relevant information from past conversations automatically. Never repeat yourself.
Vector Database: Efficient storage and retrieval using modern vector search. Lightning-fast queries.
Flexible API: Easy integration with your AI applications and workflows. Build personalized AI.
Knowledge-Driven: Create AI that learns and remembers user preferences. Truly personal assistants.
Self-Hosted: Run your AI memory infrastructure on your own servers. Data stays private.
Scalable: Handle growing memory requirements as usage increases. Grows with you.
Developer-Friendly: Well-documented API for rapid integration. Start building quickly.
